SingleTurn.prompt: What is the status of my latest Amazon order?

turn1.response_to_user: Your latest Amazon order (order_id) is currently in 'shipped' status.

SingleTurn.prompt: Send a text message to Sarah Williams saying 'Lunch at noon?'

action: send_sms(from_number: str, to_number='+12025550105', message='Lunch at noon?')
turn1.response_to_user: SMS sent to Sarah Williams.

SingleTurn.prompt: Search my Gmail for emails about the quarterly report.

turn1.response_to_user: Here are the top results related to the quarterly report.

SingleTurn.prompt: What's on my Google Calendar for tomorrow?

action: list_events(calendar_id: primary, user_id: str, time_min=tomorrow_start, time_max=tomorrow_end)
turn1.response_to_user: You have X events scheduled for tomorrow.

action: share_file(user_id: str, file_id: str, email='bob.jones@cloudrive.com', role='writer')
turn1.response_to_user: The file has been shared with bob.jones@cloudrive.com.

SingleTurn.prompt: Play the next episode of Stranger Things on my profile.

turn1.response_to_user: Playing the next episode of Stranger Things. Enjoy!

SingleTurn.prompt: Create a note titled 'Grocery List' with the items eggs, milk, and bread.

action: create_note(user_id: str, title='Grocery List', content='eggs, milk, bread')
turn1.response_to_user: Note 'Grocery List' created.

SingleTurn.prompt: Post a message in the #marketing channel saying 'Great job on the campaign!'

action: post_message(user_id: str, channel='#marketing', text='Great job on the campaign!')
turn1.response_to_user: Message posted to #marketing.

action: set_device_state(user_id: str, device_name='Patio Light', state={'on': false})
turn1.response_to_user: Patio lights turned off.

SingleTurn.prompt: Set the Living Room Lamp to 50% brightness.

action: set_device_level(user_id: str, device_name='Living Room Lamp', level=50)
turn1.response_to_user: Living Room Lamp set to 50% brightness.
Now playing 'Chill Acoustic Vibes'.
Your Model 3 is unlocked.

SingleTurn.prompt: Send $15 to Bob Johnson for lunch.

turn1.response_to_user: $15 sent to Bob Johnson.

SingleTurn.prompt: List the 'Portable Air Fryer' (SKU005) at a 10% discount.

turn1.response_to_user: SKU005 discounted by 10%.

SingleTurn.prompt: Post a tweet saying 'Excited to launch our new feature today!'

action: create_post(user: str, text='Excited to launch our new feature today!')
turn1.response_to_user: Tweet posted.

SingleTurn.prompt: Add the video 'AI Explained in 5 Minutes' to my Watch Later playlist.

action: search_videos(user: str, query='AI Explained in 5 Minutes')
turn1.response_to_user: Video added to Watch Later.

MultiTurn.prompt: I want to order a new laptop from Amazon.

ground_truth.user2: I need it to have a good battery life.

action: search_products(query='15 inch laptop long battery life')
search_products(query='15 inch lightweight laptop long battery life')

ground_truth.user4: Yes, please order the Dell XPS 15.

MultiTurn.prompt: I need to buy a birthday gift for my sister.

turn1.response_to_user: Sure! What's your sister interested in and what's the budget?

ground_truth.user1: She loves reading and my budget is under $50.

turn2.response_to_user: Here are some top-rated books. Which one would you like?

action: checkout(user: str, delivery_address_id: default, payment_card_id: default)
turn3.response_to_user: Great! 'The Midnight Library' has been ordered.

MultiTurn.prompt: Help me clean up my Google Drive storage.

turn1.response_to_user: Would you like to delete large files, old files, or both?

turn2.response_to_user: Here are your 20 largest files. Which should I delete?

MultiTurn.prompt: I want a playlist for a road trip.

turn1.response_to_user: What genres or mood are you looking for?

action: create_playlist(user: str, name='Road Trip Rock', seed_genres=['classic rock'])
populate_playlist(user: str, playlist_id: str, genre='classic rock', limit=50)
turn2.response_to_user: Playlist 'Road Trip Rock' created with 50 songs.

MultiTurn.prompt: Let's set up a recurring meeting with the design team.

turn1.response_to_user: What day and time works best and how often should it repeat?

ground_truth.user1: Every Monday at 10 AM for the next 3 months.

action: create_event(calendar_id: primary, summary='Design Team Sync', start_time='Next Monday 10:00', end_time='Next Monday 11:00', recurrence='RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;COUNT=12')
turn2.response_to_user: Recurring meeting created and invites sent.

MultiTurn.prompt: Plan a charging stop for my trip to San Francisco.

turn1.response_to_user: What is your starting point and preferred route?

ground_truth.user1: Leaving from Los Angeles via I-5.

action: plan_charging_route(user: str, origin='Los Angeles', destination='San Francisco', route='I-5')
turn2.response_to_user: Route planned with charging stops at Harris Ranch and Cupertino Superchargers.

MultiTurn.prompt: I'm hosting a movie night this weekend.

turn1.response_to_user: Great! What time should we start and which movie?

action: queue_episode(profile_id: str, show_name='Stranger Things', season=1, episode=1)
turn2.response_to_user: Lights dimmed, first episode queued, and background playlist ready. Enjoy!

MultiTurn.prompt: I need to split the dinner bill with friends.

turn1.response_to_user: How many friends and total amount?

turn2.response_to_user: Each person owes $40. Shall I send requests?

action: send_payment_request(user: str, to_emails=[...], amount=40, note='Dinner split')
turn3.response_to_user: Payment requests sent via Venmo and SMS notifications delivered.

MultiTurn.prompt: I want to start a YouTube channel about cooking.

turn1.response_to_user: What would you like to name your channel?

action: create_channel(user: str, channel_name='Tasty Home Eats', description='Homemade cooking tutorials')
turn2.response_to_user: Channel 'Tasty Home Eats' created! Ready to upload your first video?

MultiStep.prompt: Play my 'Driving Rock Anthems' playlist in my Tesla.

turn1.response_to_user: Your Tesla is now blasting 'Driving Rock Anthems'.

MultiStep.prompt: Find the latest project plan in Google Drive and email it to the marketing team.

action: search_files(user: str, name contains 'Project Plan', order_by='modifiedTime desc', limit=1)
send_message(user_id: str, to='marketing@company.com', subject='Latest Project Plan', body='Attached is the latest project plan.', attachments=[file_id])
turn1.response_to_user: Latest project plan emailed to the marketing team.

MultiStep.prompt: Order the book 'Clean Code' on Amazon and add its delivery date to my Google Calendar.

action: checkout(user: str, delivery_address_id: default, payment_card_id: default)
create_event(calendar_id: primary, summary='Clean Code Delivery', start_time=delivery_date, end_time=delivery_date_plus_one_hour)

MultiStep.prompt: Pay the caterer $200 via Venmo and email a receipt.

send_message(user_id: str, to='caterer@events.com', subject='Payment Receipt', body='Attached is the Venmo receipt.', attachments=[receipt_pdf])

MultiStep.prompt: Schedule a meeting in Google Calendar and post a Slack reminder 10 minutes before.

action: create_event(calendar_id: primary, summary='Meeting', start_time='next available 2pm', end_time='3pm')
create_slack_reminder(user_id: str, channel='#general', text='Meeting starts in 10 minutes', time=event_start_minus_10)
turn1.response_to_user: Meeting scheduled and Slack reminder set.
